name: Billimarie Robinson
description: Regenerative technologist, multidisciplinary artist, and nonprofit founder building humane technology, ecological restoration systems, and story-driven educational experiences.

hasOccupation.name: Regenerative Technologist
hasOccupation.description: Designs systems that integrate ecology, technology, and long-term stewardship.

hasOccupation.name: Multidisciplinary Artist
hasOccupation.description: Creates stories, experiences, and artworks across media.

owns.name: For Every Star A Tree
owns.description: A regenerative desert nonprofit restoring habitat, soil, and ecological literacy.

creator.name: The Last Forest On Earth
creator.description: A solarpunk and dystopian fantasy universe spanning novels, games, and immersive experiences.
